name: Dead Plants
description: Dead Plants is a queer indie platformer game made by Avery, Alessandra, Cody and Rhonda as part of the 2020 Gamerella game jam on the theme of “normal”. Inspired by the work of Legacy Russell, you alternate between night and day cycles - regenerating  in your room at night with queer plant cyberspace and code-switching to survive and resist heteropatriarchal capitalism.
